data.title: Jamal Crawford, Basketball Player
data.meta_description: Jamal Crawford stats and bio. Stats averages season by season. Quick access to game by game stats.
data.text:
Jamal Crawford - Points

Jamal Crawford scores a career high 52 points (2007)

On January 26, 2007, Jamal Crawford set his career high in points in a NBA game. That day he scored 52 points in New York's home win against Miami, 116-96. He also had 3 rebounds, 1 assist, 2 steals. He shot 12/20 from two, 8/10 from three, shooting at 66.7% from the field. He also shot 4/4 from the free-throw line.

Jamal Crawford - Rebounds

Jamal Crawford grabs a career high 11 rebounds (2004)

On February 17, 2004, Jamal Crawford tied his career high in rebounds in a NBA game. That day he grabbed 11 rebounds in Chicago's home win against Toronto, 75-73. He also had 25 points, 5 assists.

Jamal Crawford - Assists

Jamal Crawford gives a career high 14 assists (2018)

On December 18, 2018, Jamal Crawford set his career high in assists in a NBA game. That day he dished 14 assists in Phoenix's road win against New York, 110-128. He also had 6 points, 2 rebounds, 1 steal.

Jamal Crawford - Steals

Jamal Crawford has a career high 6 steals (2005)

On February 16, 2005, Jamal Crawford tied his career high in steals in a NBA game. That day he reached 6 steals in New York's home win against Milwaukee, 108-90. He also had 23 points, 3 rebounds and 3 assists.

Jamal Crawford - Blocks

Jamal Crawford blocks a career high 3 shots (2004)

On November 19, 2004, Jamal Crawford set his career high in blocks in a NBA game. That day he went for 3 blocks in New York's road loss against Dallas, 103-101. He also had 26 points, 5 rebounds and 6 assists.

Jamal Crawford - Efficiency

Jamal Crawford records a career high 46 efficiency rating (2003)

On December 27, 2003, Jamal Crawford tied his career high in efficiency in a NBA game. That day he accomplished 46 efficiency in Chicago's home win against Washington, 100-86. He also had 42 points, 4 rebounds and 6 assists.
